message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[17-Apr-2025 18:56:16 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_ext_relevant ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, keyword varchar(255) NOT NULL, text varchar(255) NOT NULL, url varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id(id) )ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
